S

score - Variable in class Sports
array of type int that holds the score of both players, index 0 for team 1 and index 1 for team 2
ScoreboardDriver - Class in <Unnamed>
this class is a command line interface where the user that implements polymorphism, depending the user input it creates an object of the according sport class that inherits from the sport super class the entire command line interface works for whatever object is created.
ScoreboardDriver() - Constructor for class ScoreboardDriver

setGameOver(boolean) - Method in class Sports
setter for the gameOver variable, call this method to indicate the end or start of the game

method to set the score of the indicated team

Soccer - Class in <Unnamed>

Soccer(String, String) - Constructor for class Soccer

Sports - Class in <Unnamed>
abstract class that serves as the base class for the sports hierarchy
Sports(String, String) - Constructor for class Sports
Class super constructor, this cant be used to instantiate an object of the sports class but it can be called by the subclasses
